welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kuala Lumpur, a vibrant city known for its rich cultural heritage, stunning skyline, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm and beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Nasi Ayam Kampung
restaurants.description: Nasi Ayam Kampung is a malay restaurant located in Kuala Lumpur.
restaurants.address: 35, Medan Selera, Lorong Raja Muda (Kampung Baru), Kuala Lumpur, Kuala Lumpur
